short_description: laznas phr is a community foundation based in pekanbaru, indonesia.
long_description: menjadi lembaga amil zakat, infaq, shodaqoh dan wakaf yang dipercaya muzakki dan mustahik di provinsi riau karena amanahnya, profesionalismenya dan kinerjanya untuk membersihkan harta muzakki dan mengangkat derajat mustahik. laznas phr adalah lembaga filantropi dibawah naungan yayasan karyawan muslim rokan indonesia yang menghimpun, mengelola dan mendistribusikan dana zakat, infak, sedekah dan wakaf, serta dana sosial lainnya melalui berbagai program kebaikan. program kebaikan direalisasikan melalui 5 rumpun program utama, yaitu riau sejahtera, riau sehat, riau berdaya, riau beriman dan riau cemerlang. kantor pusat dan cabang south area laznas phr.
generated_description: laznas phr is a philanthropic organization based in pekanbaru, riau, under the umbrella of yayasan karyawan muslim rokan indonesia. it specializes in managing zakat, infaq, sedekah, and wakaf funds. the organization focuses on facilitating the payment of zakat and distributing funds to the poor and needy through various programs such as riau sejahtera, riau sehat, riau berdaya, riau beriman, and riau cemerlang. laznas phr also implements specific programs like the clean water project and clean energy project. the organization operates branches in the south area, covering areas such as pekanbaru, siak, and kampar, and in the north area, including bengkalis, dumai, and rokan hilir.
